titles.title: To suspend until January 1, 2002, the duty on Sodium Bentazon.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 5/22/1998--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to reduce, through December 31, 2001, the duty on sodium bentazon, (3-(1-methylethyl)-1H- 2,1,3-benzothiadiazin-4(3H)-one-2,2-dioxide).
